item.description:
In all likelihood, you have already seen the Wachowski sibling’s 1999 classic The Matrix!  But did you ever hear the terrific commentary by Ken Wilber and Cornel West that goes along with the Special DVD Edition?!

In honor of the Wachowski sibling’s great recent film, Cloud Atlas, we will revisit The Matrix while listening to the Wilber and West philosophical discussion!  We will start the film promptly at 7:15 pm, and if time permits, have a short discussion afterwards.  Feel free to BYOP = Bring Your Own Popcorn, and I look forward to sharing this great cinematic event with the Boston Integral Commons community!
item.name: The Matrix: Special Edition!
